title: Snowdown shop
body: riot thankyou for snowdown shop. there was 1 little problem 5 of the 6 skin you gave me i already own and i am not buying a 20 dollar skin with only a 20% discount

replies.body: My 70% off skin that I was offered is Challenger Ahri... I really want that skin but an error keeps coming up when I click on it.... I want that skin that I was offered for that price... I am a faithful customer to you guys!!!!! I think I have bought over 1000 dollars worth of skins in like 9 months... Please fix this problem!! I need that skin!{{champion:103}}
Submit a support ticket and they do the transaction for you at the stated price.
